text: ModPlug is the name for the series of computer software for creating and playing module files, originally developed by Olivier Lapicque. * ModPlug Player, a module player developed in conjunction with the original ModPlug Tracker project and the original ModPlug browser plugin * ModPlug Tracker, now known as OpenMPT * LibModplug (decoding engine) public domain software for the OpenSource multimedia framework gStreamer Category:Software that uses GStreamer
title: ModPlug
